edu.usm.cos420.assignment1.domain

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.usm.cos420.assignment1.domain.Customer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A domain class to represent a customer of the shop

    Contains three fields

    • ID, a 6 digit integer to identify the customer
    • address, a String of the customer's address
    • name, a String of the customer's name
    See Also:
